New Records: LeBron James passed Michael Jordan for most 30-point games in NBA history with 563 30-point games.
Key Match Events: LeBron James led the Los Angeles Lakers to a 119-102 victory over the Atlanta Hawks.
LeBron James finished with 30 points, three rebounds, and eight assists while shooting 13/20 from the field and 2/5 from the three-point range in 29 minutes.
Miscellaneous Highlights: With the victory, the Lakers improved to 20-14 in 34 games, which has them as the fourth seed in the Western Conference.
The Lakers are in the middle of a two-game winning streak and have gone 7-3 over their last ten games.
